items.name: Item: Content Page
items.text: Listen to the story and then answer the questions
items.tts: A big man was jogging towards his red sports car on a mountain road. He was very tired. When he reached the car he leaned against it to catch his breath. Just then a young man was driving by in a truck. He saw the tired man leaning on the car. He decided to help that man. He stopped his truck and got out. But he thought the tired man was pushing his car. So he started to push the red sports car too. Suddenly the car fell off the cliff and down the mountain. It was a terrible misunderstanding.

items.name: Answer the question I (multichoice + image)
items.text: What does the young man with dreadlocks do after stopping his truck?
answers: He offers the big man a ride in his truck.
He gives the big man a chocolate bar.
He calls for help to assist the big man.

items.name: Answer the question II (multichoice)
items.text: What happens after the young man with dreadlocks sees the big man leaning on the red sports car?
answers: He helps the big man by giving him a ride in his truck.
He helps the big man by pushing the car.
He calls for help because he thinks the big man is in trouble.
He ignores the big man and continues driving his truck.
